biotools.summary: PIPENN stands for 'Protein Interface Prediction from sequence with an Ensemble of Neural Nets'. PIPENN is a suite of DL methods for predicting protein bindings of different interaction types (protein-protein, protein-small-molecule, protein-nucleotide(DNA/RNA)) at residue-level, using only information from a protein sequence as input.
